comment.author: 35068121@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Classic cars of Montreal / Voitures Classiques de Montréal, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: I agree on the date.  Most of the vehicles are from the 1920's.  I also noticed the sign in the upper left advertising Fletcher's Castoria.  I remember that all too well.
